110010000.text:
[Recommended Level] 12
I want to give the children a wooden spear and shield as a gift.
The Soul Steel can surely make them as toys that the children could play with.

Let's collect the materials and go to the Soul Steel.

110010001.text:
[Recommended Level] 12
At the Soul Steel, two artisans are arguing with each other.
I think they're talking about gear that they've made.

I'd better take a listen.

110010002.text:
[Recommended Level] 29
The researcher Kunale, who's researching the Fissure at the Bottomless Pit, asked me to collect some Hollow specimens.

It seems like I have to go deeper into the center of the pit, but isn't it dangerous? Should I still give it a try?

110010003.text:
[Recommended Level] 29
When I brought an interesting Hollow specimen to Kunale, she was very excited and asked for a specimen of the creature itself.

This special specimen must come from a stronger being than an ordinary Hollow.

I should explore the Bottomless Pit and look for anything that stands out.

110010004.text:
[Recommended Level] 29
Josahun, who's working as Fissure Researcher Kunale's assistant at the Bottomless Pit, asks if I know what a Fable is.

If there is a Fable in the Bottomless Pit, there might be some useful information recorded on it.
Josahun is speculating that there must be one there, but he can't muster the courage to explore this place filled with Hollows.

Let's find the Fable for Josahun and tell him about the information it holds.

110010005.text:
[Recommended Level] 30
I found a canyon that seems a little eerie.

It's a long way from the entrance to the inside, and it would take someone with a lot of guts to explore that place.

There couldn't possibly be anyone here... Huh? What's that?

110010006.text:
[Recommended Level] 26
The wreckage was destroyed beyond recognition, but I found a Battered Chest in the midst of the remnants.

Maybe there's something worth taking inside?
Let's clear the Cobalt Hermit Crabs in the area and check out the chest.

110010007.text:
[Recommended Level] 13
Two Blueskin members were whispering about someone.
The topic doesn't seem very pleasant and both of them seem agitated, but I'm curious.

Let's listen.

110010008.text:
[Recommended Level] 17
The worried woodcutter seems to be haunted by nightmares every night after picking up a strange mineral from the Highland Central Trail.

He fears that the mineral might come looking for him again, so I should reassure him by checking if it's still where he last saw it.

110010009.text:
[Recommended Level] 13
A crazy old man keeps looking for something while screaming for the Sagewood.

Who or what could he be looking for? Whatever it is, does it even exist?

Let's take a look around.

110010010.text:
[Recommended Level] 17
A man is mumbling something under his breath. Let's see what he has to say.

110010011.text:
[Recommended Level] 13
The child that I bumped into on the Highland Central Forest Trail boasted that he ran into a Tree Spirit.

I should go and check out the location he mentioned.

110010012.text:
[Recommended Level] 7
I've found something.
I'd better take a closer look.

110010013.text:
[Recommended Level] 10
I've found something.
I'd better take a closer look.

110010014.text:
[Recommended Level] 7
I've met a man who talks too much about the Enigma Council, who broker and manage various requests.

He might seem to be praising the Enigma Council, but I think he must have some grudge against their Manager.

Well, since the Chivalry Quest he mentioned does seem to be an interesting one, I should check out the Chivalry Quest Board.

110010015.text:
[Recommended Level] 13
Gray Breeze, the president of the Nature Society, claims that the Sapphire Basin environment is in danger because of the Poacher Gang's reckless activities.

Some Nature Society people have been killed while trying to stop them.

Defeat the Poacher Gang for the Nature Society and help with the emergency aid of the injured animals!

110010016.text:
[Recommended Level] 7
Naypaw, the leader of the Baron Pioneers, says he will introduce his fellow members.

It actually seems like Naypaw is just passing the buck of finding his members to me... But I guess it wouldn't hurt to look around the ruins, anyway.

110010017.text:
[Recommended Level] 20
It seems Pahpaw hasn't been collecting grass and has instead gotten drunk from eating it.

The scent of the Baron grass would've been too tempting for him to resist.
No wonder he failed to collect anything...

I should pick up the basket and collect grass for Pahpaw. It won't be too late, even if I wake him after that.

110010018.text:
[Recommended Level] 22
Unfortunately, Poofur is too weak to hunt the wild bears and saberfangs.

Let's collect the fur of the wild bears and saberfangs so that Poofur can complete the job safely.

110010019.text:
[Recommended Level] 31
Pahpaw and Poofur ran out in a big hurry. Although out of breath, it didn't take those two long before they started to argue about something.

I had better listen and see what this is all about.

110010020.text:
[Recommended Level] 22
Jimmy Ace the Hesuth Hunter says that he can't accept anyone else into his group because of the hunting expenses.

However, he will consider accepting me if I hunt the wild bears and saberfangs.

I guess it's time for me to show what I can do.

110010021.text:
[Recommended Level] 22
Jimmy Ace, who seemed rather surprised at how easily I defeated the wild bears and saberfangs, was content with my skills and allowed me to join the Hesuth hunt.

But his men were against me and so he told me to wait. Then, he haughtily said he had a special mission for me.

It's a mission to track the Hesuth... Can I do this?

110010022.text:
[Recommended Level] 10
It was kind of sad to say goodbye to the Baron Pioneers.

Naypaw said farewell, telling me that I should find the parting gift that was hidden for me as my last mission.

It's somewhere in the Soul Bridge, so let's find it.

110010023.text:
Naypaw says he's prepared a gift with his farewell. But he said something about it being too boring to give without some kind of challenge?

He told me to go to the greenest place in Soul Bridge, I'll find out once I get there!

110010024.text:
[Recommended Level] 46
Elucidator Scholar Kyunghan was trying to find the culprit who broke the leader's Fable. But hailing from a scholarly background, he's having trouble finding the culprit.

Let's help him deliver justice.

110010025.text:
I saw a writing on a board by someone who was desperate and couldn't stand the tyranny of the Blue Bandits.

Let's crush the tyranny of the Blue Bandits so that these people can come back home.

110010026.text:
[Recommended Level] 13
Zephyr, a member of the Nature Society Rescuer, is worried for the wild animals that are dying or getting injured because of the Saberfangs appearing in the Highland Central Trail.

Let's hunt the Ravenous Predator Saberfangs threatening the habitat of Highland Central Trail for Zephyr, who's busy taking care of the wounded stags.

110010027.text:
[Recommended Level] 13
Southwind, a member of the Nature Society Enforcers, is planning a surprise attack to wipe out the Poacher Gang.

Help Southwind to protect the wilds of Sapphire Basin by attacking the Poacher Gang base.

110010028.text:
Sohyang's parents, who suddenly lost their daughter, want to be with her for her last journey to the afterlife so that she's not lonely.

Let's accompany them to the Deep Forest Graveyard and protect them from danger so that they can safely see Sohyang off on her last journey.

110010029.text:
[Recommended Level] 17
The strange Dokkaebi claimed she was originally a person.

She asked me to punish the Dokkaebis who transformed her and to return her to her original form.

Let's take care of the Dokkaebis who've committed this horrible prank.

110010030.text:
[Recommended Level] 20
The Sapphire Ranch worker Ah Chu is troubled by his worsening sneezing caused by a Bulbari allergy.

I feel bad for his suffering, saying that he can't go anywhere in their vicinity.

Let's hunt down those Bulbaries so that Ah Chu can find some relief.

110010031.text:
[Recommended Level] 25
The Ploggle blacksmith, Mowa, came up with measures for a long-term battle with the consumed monsters.

Let's get the materials for Mowa's plan to build Ploggle weapons and armor using the monsters' leather and teeth.

110010032.text:
[Recommended Level] 7
Let's explore the Awakened Corridor to the very end.

110010033.text:
[Recommended Level] 7
Let's explore the Awakened Corridor to the very end.

110010100.text:
[Recommended Level] 12
I can see the village children playing with spears and shields. Aran and I played just like that back when we were little...

Let's see how the kids play these days.

110010101.text:
[Recommended Level] 12
At Soul Steel, two artisans are arguing with each other.

I think they're talking about gear that they've crafted. I'd better take a listen.

110010102.text:
[Recommended Level] 29
The researcher Kunale, who's researching the Fissure at the Bottomless Pit, asked me to collect some Hollow specimens.

It seems like I have to go deeper into the center of the pit, but isn't it dangerous? Should I still give it a try?

110010103.text:
[Recommended Level] 29
When I brought an interesting Hollow specimen to Kunale, she was very excited and asked for a specimen of the creature itself.

This special specimen must come from a stronger being than an ordinary Hollow.

I should explore the Bottomless Pit and look for anything that stands out.

110010104.text:
[Recommended Level] 29
Josahun, who's working as Fissure Researcher Kunale's assistant at the Bottomless Pit, asks if I know what a Fable is.

If there is a Fable in the Bottomless Pit, there might be some useful information recorded on it.
Josahun is speculating that there must be one there, but he can't muster the courage to explore this place filled with Hollows.

Let's find the Fable for Josahun and tell him about the information it holds.

110010105.text:
[Recommended Level] 30
I found a canyon that seems a little eerie.

It's a long way from the entrance to the inside, and it would take someone with a lot of guts to explore that place.

There couldn't possibly be anyone here... Huh? What's that?

110010106.text:
[Recommended Level] 26
The wreckage was destroyed beyond recognition, but I found a Battered Chest in the midst of the remnants.

Maybe there's something worth taking inside?
Let's clear the Cobalt Hermit Crabs in the area and check out the chest.

110010107.text:
[Recommended Level] 13
Two Blueskin members were whispering about someone.
The topic doesn't seem very pleasant and both of them seem agitated, but I'm curious.

Let's listen.

110010108.text:
[Recommended Level] 17
The worried woodcutter seems to be haunted by nightmares every night after picking up a strange mineral from the Highland Central Trail.

He fears that the mineral might come looking for him again, so I should reassure him by checking if it's still where he last saw it.

110010109.text:
[Recommended Level] 13
A crazy old man keeps looking for something while screaming for the Sagewood.

Who or what could he be looking for? Whatever it is, does it even exist?

Let's take a look around.

110010110.text:
[Recommended Level] 17
A man is mumbling something under his breath. Let's see what he has to say.

110010111.text:
[Recommended Level] 13
The child that I bumped into on the Highland Central Forest Trail boasted that he ran into a Tree Spirit.

I should go and check out the location he mentioned.

110010112.text:
[Recommended Level] 7
I've found something.
I'd better take a closer look.

110010113.text:
[Recommended Level] 10
I've found something.
I'd better take a closer look.

110010114.text:
[Recommended Level] 7
I had the sensation of being watched, so I looked around. Some strange man is waving at me. He looks extremely suspicious, but intriguing.

Should I talk to this guy?

110010115.text:
[Recommended Level] 13
The Nature Society President Gray Breeze was pacing back and forth on his front porch.

Does he have something on his mind? Let's go ask him.

110010116.text:
[Recommended Level] 7
Naypaw, the leader of the Baron Pioneers, says he will introduce his fellow members.

It actually seems like Naypaw is just passing the buck of finding his members to me... But I guess it wouldn't hurt to look around the ruins, anyway.

110010117.text:
[Recommended Level] 20
I can see Pahpaw sleeping under that tree without a care in the world.

Judging by the Baron Pioneers' reputation, I can feel that something is wrong.

Let's wake Pahpaw and send him back to work.

110010118.text:
[Recommended Level] 22
Poofur from the Baron Pioneers is hiding behind a tree and watching the wild animals.

I could always just ignore their troubles, but I can't bring myself to do that after seeing the pitiful look on his face.

Something must be up, so I should go help him out.

110010119.text:
[Recommended Level] 31
Pahpaw and Poofur ran out in a big hurry.

Although out of breath, it didn't take the two long before they started to argue about something. I had better listen and see what this is all about.

110010120.text:
[Recommended Level] 22
Some Hesuth Hunters are promoting their activities by the Rocky Hill entrance.

Upon taking a closer look, it seems like they were gathering warriors to hunt Hesuth together with...? Seems like the pay would be good.

Let's go and have a chat with them.

110010121.text:
[Recommended Level] 22
Jimmy Ace, who seemed rather surprised at how easily I defeated the wild bears and saberfangs, was content with my skills and allowed me to join the Hesuth hunt.

But his men were against me and so he told me to wait. Then, he haughtily said he had a special mission for me.

It's a mission to track the Hesuth... Can I do this?

110010122.text:
[Recommended Level] 10
The Baron Pioneers are gathered at the Moonwater Harbor dock.

They seem to be looking for someone, and they're waving their paws after spotting me.

Were they looking for me?

110010123.text:
After being acknowledged as a legitimate group, the Baron Pioneers plan to expand their activities into the new continent.

Naypaw said he left one last gift for me, an honorary member.

I should go to Soul Bridge.

110010124.text:
[Recommended Level] 46
He looks like he could use someone to talk to.
I wonder what he's thinking about, staring at the other side of the cliff like that.

Let's find out.

110010125.text:
I saw a writing on a board by someone who was desperate and couldn't stand the tyranny of the Blue Bandits.

Let's crush the tyranny of the Blue Bandits so that these people can come back home.

110010126.text:
[Recommended Level] 13
The healer Zephyr, who's in charge of treating wounded wild animals at the Nature Society, is crying while he treats an injured stag.

The danger to the stags and weak herbivores have nearly doubled because of the saberfangs, which have noticeably increased in number.

It's hard to look into the sad eyes of the stag next to Zephyr. I guess I'd better help...

110010127.text:
[Recommended Level] 13
Southwind, a member of the Nature Society Enforcers, is planning a surprise attack to wipe out the Poacher Gang.

Help Southwind to protect the wilds of Sapphire Basin by attacking the Poacher Gang base.

110010128.text:
Sohyang's parents, who suddenly lost their daughter, want to be with her for her last journey to the afterlife so that she's not lonely.

Let's accompany them to the Deep Forest Graveyard and protect them from danger so that they can safely see Sohyang off on her last journey.

110010129.text:
[Recommended Level] 17
I met a strange Dokkaebi in the Deep Forest Graveyard.

She claimed that she's a person that was tricked by a Dokkaebi into becoming one, and now she wants help. What should I do?

110010130.text:
[Recommended Level] 20
The Sapphire Ranch worker Ah Chu is troubled by his worsening sneezing caused by a Bulbari allergy.

I feel bad for his suffering, saying that he can't go anywhere in their vicinity.

Let's hunt down those Bulbaries so that Ah Chu can find some relief.

110010131.text:
[Recommended Level] 25
The Ploggle blacksmith, Mowa, came up with measures for a long-term battle with the consumed monsters.

Let's get the materials for Mowa's plan to build Ploggle weapons and armor using the monsters' leather and teeth.

110010132.text:
[Recommended Level] 7
According to Aran, there are other Awakened Corridors around the Barren Ruins. He pointed at the entrance to an Awakened Corridor in which he'd been particularly interested.

I don't feel confident enough to explore an Awakened Corridor without Aran, but I did it once already. I can do it again.

I should enter the Awakened Corridor on the other side.

110010133.text:
[Recommended Level] 7
I wasn't consciously looking for Awakened Corridors, but somehow I found one, again. Aran said since I discovered it, I should explore it, too.

I don't feel confident enough to explore an Awakened Corridor without Aran, but I did it once already. I can do it again.

I should enter the Awakened Corridor before me.
